DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy Octaplas LG Octaplas SD term recovery coagulation factor haemostatic parameter . The secondary objective study compare safety tolerability Octaplas LG Octaplas SD term haematological clinical chemistry parameter adverse event monitoring .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigate Relative Efficacy , Safety , Tolerability Octaplas LG Versus Octaplas SD
DOC.criteria: Capable understand comply aspect protocol . Signed Informed Consent . Capable understanding plasmapheresis information sheet sign . Healthy male female volunteer , age 18 year old . Women must negative pregnancy test ( human chorionic gonadotropin [ HCG ] base assay ) . Women must sufficient method contraception ( eg , intrauterine device , oral contraception , etc ) . No clinically relevant abnormality medical history general physical examination . Standard health insurance . Pregnancy lactation . Tattoos within last 3 month . Subject treat therapeutically fresh frozen plasma , blood , plasmaderived product within last 6 month . Hypersensitivity blood product plasma protein . History angioedema . History coagulation bleed disorder know abnormality affect coagulation , fibrinolysis , platelet function . Any clinically significant abnormal laboratory value . IgA deficiency . Seropositivity hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C virus , human immunodeficiency virus type 1 type 2 antibody . Symptoms clinically relevant illness within 3 week first trial day . History suspect drug alcohol abuse . Subjects currently participate another clinical study . Any investigational medicinal product administration within last 4 week .
